about_the_game:
In the immersive world of 'Timeways', you are Elliot, a gifted detective whose unique skill can alter the fabric of time itself. Set against the backdrop of a city teeming with corruption and mysteries, this game offers a unique blend of thrilling narrative, intricate puzzle-solving, and an innovative time manipulation mechanic that puts the fate of the narrative in your hands.

As you delve into the heart of the city's darkest secrets, your journey will take you through a series of challenging scenarios and dramatic encounters with characters whose destinies you can shape. With every decision and time-shift, you create ripples that affect the unfolding story, leading to multiple endings based on your actions.

Your mission is to peel away layers of deceit, confront moral dilemmas, and ultimately bring justice by leveraging your time-altering abilities. As you uncover evidence and connect the dots, you'll find yourself questioning the very nature of truth and the impact of your decisions.

'Timeways' presents an intricate world filled with complex characters, each with their own backstories and motives. From confronting corrupt officials to saving innocent lives, the weight of your choices has never been heavier. But with great power comes great responsibility – how you use your abilities will not only determine the outcome of your cases but also define your legacy as a detective.

Are you ready to embrace the mysteries of time, uncover the truth, and decide the fate of those around you in 'Timeways'? How far will you go to solve the unsolvable?

name: Timeways

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 10

short_description: Dive into 'Timeways', a riveting adventure where you control Elliot, a detective with the rare ability to warp time. Solve complex puzzles, uncover hidden secrets, and navigate through a world ripe with intrigue. Will you alter the course of history to uncover the truth?
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
